sense.def:
An invasion of a country
je dejstvo, da neka vojska s silo vstopi v državo.

seg.quote: ...the invasion of Europe by the Allies in 1944.
It enabled us to remain free from invasion.

sense.def:
Prihod večjega števila stvari ali oseb lahko imenujemo
an invasion
.

seg.quote: ...the invasion of Italian movies in the fifties.
